name: ZomBusNator
description:
Zombusnator is a vr game made for a student project. 

it icludes guns, a turret, a bus .... and Oh!Yes ... ZOMBIES!

Your goal is to not getting beaten up or eaten until the end of the track by using the weapons at your disposal.

Little trick : The turret must be hold with 2 hands for you to be able to shoot.

Awareness : One a the mechanic can be a little touchy. Not suitable for those of a sensitive disposition.

Voice play only in french

Meet the team :

Game Design :  Thomas Fleury,  Valentin Nicolats

Level Design : Nicolas Taupin

Graphism : Maxime Rodde

Music : Aurelien Gacher

Programmation : Fran Lucas, Thomas Fleury, Valentin Nicolats
